devdoc.details: This contract is an oracle that allows users to get the nav of xSolvBTC.The nav is the price of xSolvBTC in SolvBTC.The nav is obtained from the chainlink oracle.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.erc20_: The address of the erc20 token

params.aggregator_: The address of the chainlink aggregator for xSolvBTC

returns._0: latestUpdatedAt The latest update time of the nav

params.erc20_: The address of the erc20 token

returns._0: decimals The decimals of the nav

params.aggregator_: The address of the chainlink aggregator

devdoc.title: ChainlinkOracle

latestUpdatedAt().notice: Get the latest update time of the nav

navDecimals(address).notice: Get the decimals of the nav

userdoc.notice: The oracle for xSolvBTC, which is a yield token of SolvBTC.
